snippet: The State Department of Education said Friday that it would investigate reports that high school teachers in Montgomery had altered students’ grades to help them pass classes.
abstract: Alabama Department of Education says it will investigate reports that high school teachers in Montgomery had altered students' grades to help them pass classes.
lead_paragraph: The State Department of Education said Friday that it would investigate reports that high school teachers in Montgomery had altered students’ grades to help them pass classes.

headline.main: Alabama: Teachers Accused of Altering Grades
headline.print_headline: Alabama: Teachers Accused of Altering Grades
